Title: Mysterious Pneumonia Cases in Wuhan
Summary: China alerted the WHO about several pneumonia cases of unknown cause in Wuhan, marking the beginning of the COVID-19 outbreak.

Title: WHO Declares COVID-19 a Global Pandemic
Summary: The WHO officially declared COVID-19 a pandemic as the virus spread globally, causing widespread disruption.

Title: Vaccination Rollout Begins in the UK
Summary: The UK administered the first COVID-19 vaccine outside trials, marking a milestone in the global fight against the pandemic.

Title: Delta Variant Drives New Surge in 2021
Summary: The highly transmissible Delta variant led to a surge in cases worldwide, raising concerns about vaccine efficacy.

Title: Global Vaccination Milestone: 1 Billion Doses Administered
Summary: Global COVID-19 vaccine distribution surpassed 1 billion doses as nations ramped up efforts to control the pandemic.
